segments.text: This kitchen scene is heartbreaking; the sink's flooding uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down the front, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, unaware, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get wet soon from the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's balancing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching for her cookie, so innocent yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a beautiful garden, untouched by trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all potential disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids; they don't realize the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
